DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Ferriprox™ ( Deferiprone ) Oral Solution Iron Overloaded Pediatric Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-centre , open label , single treatment , uncontrolled study . A total 100 iron-overloaded pediatric patient transfusion-dependent anemia enrol study.Eligible patient receive Ferriprox ( deferiprone ) oral solution , 100 mg/mL , total daily dose 75 mg/kg body weight 100 mg/kg body weight , divide three ( 3 ) dos , 24 week .
DOC.criteria: Patients ≤ 10 year age . Patients confirm diagnosis transfusiondependent anemia , BlackfanDiamond anemia , chronic iron overload require chelation therapy . Patients chronic transfusion program , receive least eight ( 8 ) red blood cell transfusion per year minimum one year . Patients iron overload assessed serum ferritin concentration great 1000 µg/L . Patients diagnosis BlackfanDiamond anemia . Patients experienced neutropenia/agranulocytosis ( absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) < 1.5 x 109/L ) thrombocytopenia ( platelet count < 50.0 x 109/L ) . Patients previous treatment Ferriprox present serious adverse reaction intolerance require withdrawal Ferriprox . Patients evidence abnormal liver function ( ALT level > 3 time upper limit normal ; entry may delay value return normal ) . Patients evidence renal failure , characterize serum creatinine level > 2 time upper limit normal ; entry may delay value return normal .
